description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent using the 'Agent' class with an 'Ollama' model, and runs an asynchronous response printing method for a specific prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with language models, capable of running prompts and streaming responses.

classes.name: Ollama
classes.description: A model class representing the Ollama language model used by the agent.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Method to run a prompt with streaming response support.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronous method to print the response of a prompt in real-time.
